Class BugAttachment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.knowgate.projtrack.BugAttachment

  • public class BugAttachment
extends java.lang.Object

    Bug Attachment

    This class represents objects stored as blobs at k_bugs_attach table
    Version:
    3.0
